name: Itu Historic Center
address: Praça Padre Miguel, Centro, Itu, SP
description: The heart of Itu, featuring colonial architecture, charming streets, and vibrant local culture.

name: Itu City Park
description: A large green space with walking trails, playgrounds, and picnic areas for families and visitors.

name: Republic Square
address: Praça da República, Centro, Itu, SP
description: A lively square surrounded by shops, cafes, and historic landmarks, perfect for a stroll.

name: Itu Giant Phone
address: Praça Padre Miguel, Centro, Itu, SP
description: A quirky and famous oversized phone booth, a must-see photo spot in Itu.

name: Museu Republicano
address: Rua Barão do Itaim, 67, Centro, Itu, SP
description: A museum dedicated to the history of the Brazilian Republic, located in a beautiful historic building.

name: Itu Cathedral
address: Praça Padre Anchieta, Centro, Itu, SP
description: A stunning cathedral with impressive architecture and a peaceful atmosphere.

name: Varvito Park
description: A geological park showcasing unique rock formations and educational trails.

name: Itu Water Tower
address: Av. Prudente de Moraes, Itu, SP
description: An iconic water tower and symbol of Itu, offering great views and photo opportunities.
